Single Trial Analysis report generation as Word document using officer

stareport.Rd

Single Trial Analysis report generation as Word document using officer

Usage

stareport(
  fit,
  file = file,
  template = templt,
  trialdesc = "",
  trialName = "",
  crop = "",
  outliers = NULL,
  excluded = NULL,
  spatial = FALSE,
  toc = TRUE,
  table.dec = 4
)

Arguments

fit
file
template
trialName
spatial
toc
table.dec
